rooms.name: Rough East-West Path
rooms.description:
You are on a very rough and overgrown path heading east-west over rugged
terrain.  To the east the path passes between low hills.

east.description: The road heads into low hills this way.

west.description: The cross-roads and a trading post lie in this direction.

rooms.name: Rough Path Between the Hills
rooms.description:
Here the path passes between low hills. The going is very rough, but
to the east the ground is smoother. In that direction a pair of tower
looms above the hills.

east.description: You see a pair of tall towers in the distance.

rooms.name: Path through an Open Area
rooms.description:
You are on a path through an open area. East of here loom two tall towers,
joined by a barbican and surrounded by a murky moat. West the path passes
between low hills.

east.description: Two fantastic towers surrounded by a moat rise before you.

rooms.name: West Side of Moat
rooms.description:
You stand on the west side of a moat that encircles two towers, each
over 50 feet high. You will need a boat to go east across the moat. A
rugged path heads west, and another one heads north to a cluster of low
buildings.

north.description: A worn path leads to a cluster of low buildings.

east.description: The Towers loom directly over you, just beyond the moat.

west.description: An old ill-kept roads leads away to the west.

rooms.name: Path North of Moat
rooms.description:
You walk on a faint path heading south toward the west side of the moat,
and north to three small buildings.

north.description: Several low buildings lie this way.

south.description: The path ends west of the moat.

rooms.name: Cluster of Buildings
rooms.description:
You are in the middle of a cluster of small buildings. There is a building
to the north, east, and west.  A sign over the eastern building says
'House of Pancakes'.

north.description: There is an entrance to a building.

east.description: A sign over the door reads 'House of Pancakes'.

south.description: A path heads south toward the west side of the towers.

west.description: There is an entrance to a building here.

rooms.name: House of Pancakes
rooms.description:
The moment you enter this room, the ceiling descends and crushes you
into a pancake.  Don't you hate it when that happens?

rooms.name: Old Store Room
rooms.description:
You have entered what appears to be an old storeroom. Most of the items
that were in here appear to have been ruined long ago.

rooms.name: Empty Room
rooms.description:
This room appears to be completely empty. The only exit seems to be the
way you came.  There are some scratches around the floor.

down.description: You see a concealed opening leading down.

rooms.name: Minotaur's Room
rooms.description:
You have entered a secret chamber under the empty room. In this room is
the worn but cared-for gear and trappings of some large humanoid.

rooms.name: Western Moat
rooms.description:
You are in the middle of the moat, on the west side of the tower.  There is a
landing on both sides of the moat.  Deep throated 'ribbids' come from the
water all around you.

rooms.name: Northern Moat
rooms.description:
You are in the middle of the moat, on the north side of the tower.  There is
no place to land here.  Deep throated 'ribbids' come from the water all
around you.

rooms.name: Southern Moat
rooms.description:
You are in the middle of the moat, on the south side of the tower.  There is
no place to land here.  Deep throated 'ribbids' come from the water all
around you.

rooms.name: Tower Foyer
rooms.description:
You are on a foyer on the west side of the structure. The moat is west of
here. There is also a large door eastward into the structure.  You notice that
the walls are ornately decorated with very life-like stone gargoyles.

rooms.name: The Grand Lobby
rooms.description:
You have entered a vast lobby. This lobby appears to have once been very
ornately furnished, but now everything is decayed and moldering.  A highly
ornate balcony surrounds the lobby. To the east, below the balcony, is an
opening. The door leading out is west.  You notice that the balcony is
covered in highly ornate and life-like stone gargoyles.

rooms.name: Base of the Western Tower
rooms.description:
You stand in the center of the Western tower's base. Torch brackets occupy
the four corners of this huge room. Above each torch is a lifelike ornate
stone gargoyle.  There are doors north and south, and passages east and west.

rooms.name: The Musty Corridor
rooms.description:
You are walking along a musty east-west corridor joining the two towers.
There are room on each side of the corridor, and openings at each end.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description:
You have entered what must once have been a kitchen. The rusting remains of
various utensils lie on countertops. There is also an old wash basin and a
pot-belly stove.  There is a door south, and a serving hatch east.

rooms.name: Conservatory
rooms.description:
You are in the tower's private conservatory. However, through years of neglect,
the plants have grown into a hideous jungle.  The only exit is north.

rooms.name: The Dining Hall
rooms.description:
You have entered a fabulous dining hall.  The wrecked remains of a long table
dominate the room. A horrible odor pervades the room, like some foul-smelling
beast has been eating and shitting in here.  There is a serving hatch west and
a door south.

rooms.name: Art Gallery
rooms.description:
You are in the ruined remains of an art gallery. Everything appears to
have been stolen long ago, however.  The only exit is north.

rooms.name: Base of the Eastern Tower
rooms.description:
You stand in the center of the Eastern tower's base. Torch brackets occupy the
four corners of this huge room.  Above each torch is a lifelike ornate stone
gargoyle.  There are are open doors to the north and south, and passages east
and west.  In addition, a spiral staircase leads up to the next level of this
tower.

up.description: You see a spiral staircase leading up.

rooms.name: The Common Room
rooms.description:
You are in what must once have been a common room for all residents of the
tower. There is a huge fire pit with a chimney in the center, and the smashed
remains of a great many table and chairs.  The exit is south.

down.description: You notice a grate in the bottom of the fire pit.  Maybe it's an opening ...

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description:
You are in what once was the servant's quarters, as evidenced by the shabby
belongings and decor. What little remains is rotting and of little value
anyway.  The only exit is north.

rooms.name: A Large Murky Cellar
rooms.description:
You are in a large, murky cellar. An almost tangible air of horror pervades
the room.  A thin layer of nitre covers the walls and ceiling.  Rotting
furniture looms obliquely about the room.

rooms.name: On the First Staircase
rooms.description:
You are on a Spiral staircase connecting the first and second levels of
the eastern tower. You can go up or down.

rooms.name: Second Level of the Eastern Tower
rooms.description:
You are in the center of the second level of the Eastern tower. This large
room appears quite empty, except for the candle abras firmly fixed to the
walls.  An opening leads westward, and a spiral staircase leads down.

rooms.name: The Elegant Hall
rooms.description:
You are in what was once a elegant hall, although everything is moldering now.
The rotted remains of a plush carpet covers the floor, while several moldy
tapestries adorn the each side of the hall.  There are door north and south,
and openings east and west.

rooms.name: The Shaman's Room
rooms.description:
You have entered an elegantly furnished room that looks to be still in use!
Costly paintings and pieces of furniture are tastefully situated.  On the
north wall is an altar to Knar, the ghastly patron of Gargoyles.  The only
exit is south.

rooms.name: The Library
rooms.description:
This room appears to have been a library.  Empty book shelves line each wall.
The only exit is north.

rooms.name: Second Level of the Western Tower
rooms.description:
You are in the center of the western tower's second floor.  A large spiral
staircase of 29 steps connects this level with the third.  There are doors
to the east and west.  Except for a torch bracket in each corner, the
room is barren.

up.description: You see the spiral staircase leading up.

rooms.name: On the Balcony
rooms.description:
You are on the balcony overlooking the Grand lobby.  You have a fabulous
view of the entire room.  The only exit is the way you came in.

rooms.name: The Spiral Stairs
rooms.description:
You are on a large spiral staircase of 29 steps, leading between the
second and third floors.  You can go up or down.

rooms.name: Third Level of Western Tower
rooms.description:
You stand in the center of the western tower's third floor.  This large room
glows mysteriously with a strange light all its own.  From a door to the east
comes a strange inky blackness.  A spiral staircase leads down.

rooms.name: It's too dark to see anything!
The Armory
rooms.description:
In this room, which has somehow evaded the ravages of time, are neatly stored
racks of common weapons.  They appear to be quite ordinary; however, a chest
in one corner catches your eye.  The only exit is the way you came in.

rooms.name: The Officer's Quarters
rooms.description:
You have entered a lavish but functional room decked out in a military style.
Murals on the wall show battle scenes in gargoyles, minotaurs, and huge,
flying snake-like reptiles with poisonous tails fight humans and dwarves.
Various objects in the room give evidence that it is occupied by individuals
of authority.  The only door is north.

rooms.name: Third Level of Eastern Tower
rooms.description:
You are in the center of the Eastern Tower's third floor.  The room you are in
glows with a mysterious light that has no source.  In the center of the room a
ladder climbs up to a hatchway in the ceiling.  The hatchway is a strange
looking keyhole.  There is also a door to the west.

up.description: The hatchway appears securely fastened.  In it is a strange keyhole.

rooms.name: Turret of the Eastern Tower
rooms.description:
You stand in the turret of the eastern tower.  A huge hole has been
made in the roof by some enormous beast, letting the daylight (or moonlight)
in.  There is a hatchway in the floor, and an opening to the west leading out
onto a catwalk.

west.description: There is a small opening this way.

rooms.name: On the Catwalk
rooms.description:
You are outdoors on a catwalk between the turrets of the eastern and
western towers.  There is a 40 foot drop to the north and south.  You have
a fabulous view of the surrounding countryside, which consists of a bleak
wilderness.  At the east end of the catwalk is a small opening leading
inside the eastern turret.  At the western end, a strange mirror-like portal
leads into the western turret.

west.description: A mirror-like portal glimmers, allowing entry into the western turret.

rooms.name: Turret of the Western Tower
rooms.description:
You are in the turret of the western tower.  You feel very strange here.
Scattered about this room are a great many coins and valuable articles.
Yet you can't get rid of a feeling of dread!  A mirror-like portal is in the
western wall.

west.description: A mirror-like portal glimmers in this wall.

rooms.name: On the Other Side
rooms.description:
You are outdoors on a catwalk between the turrets of the Eastern and Western
towers.  There is no opening into the western tower of any kind.  You have a
fabulous view of your surroundings, a murky city partially obscured by strange
smoke that creeps along the ground instead of rising. The city stretches as far
as the eye can see under the conditions.

rooms.name: The Chamber
rooms.description:
You are in a small carpeted chamber. The chamber is empty except for a single
chair facing a mirror on the wall.

rooms.name: Main Eastern Road
rooms.description:
You are on the old Eastern Road.  The crossroads to the east joins ANOTHER
northern route to this road, which continues east.  South of the crossroads is
an old building.  The area around here is lightly timbered.

east.description: You see a cross roads and an old building.

rooms.name: Crossroads to the Wilderness
rooms.description:
You are at a crossroads to the wilderness areas east and north of here,
and the more civilized areas to the west. The main road is west, an
older road continues east, and a simple trail heads north.  To the south,
an old ram-shackle building is being used as a trading post for the
surrounding wilderness.

north.description: You see a trail leading north.

east.description: The old Eastern road continues this way.

south.description: An old, ram-shackle building serves as a trading post here.

rooms.name: Trading Post
rooms.description:
You are in a trading post just south of the crossroads, where rangers,
trappers and hunters from the surrounding area come to buy, sell, and
barter goods.

north.description: The door opens out on the crossroads.

rooms.name: Trail north of crossroads
rooms.description:
You are on a primitive north-south trail. South of here is a major cross-
roads and an old building. To the north the trail continues toward a
deep, dark forest.

north.description: The trail continues toward a deep, dark, forest.

south.description: A major crossroads and a building lie in this direction.

rooms.name: Trail south of forest
rooms.description:
You are on a primitive north-south trail.  Just north of here looms the
entrance to a deep, dark forest. To the south the trail continues.

north.description: The trail enters a dark forest of thick oaks this way.

rooms.name: Entrance to the forest
rooms.description:
You are at the entrance to dark forest comprised mostly of huge black oak
and towering firs.  A trail from the south continues north on into the
woods at this point.

north.description: You see the trail continuing into the forest.

south.description: You see the trail head back on south.

rooms.name: Trail in Dark Oak Forest
rooms.description:
The trail here passes through groves of closely knit Black Oak. Some of
these trees are of enormous size.  Rustling and other low noises come
from the forest on either side of the trail.  The trail continues on north
and south.

north.description: You see the trail continue into thick, dark forest.

south.description: The edge of the forest is visible in this direction.

rooms.name: Junction in Dark Forest
rooms.description:
You are in the midst of a deep dark forest of huge oak trees.  There is a
junction of trails here, with paths leading south, west and east.

east.description: A path disappears into thick forest.

south.description: A path disappears into thick forest.

west.description: You see the path to the Centaur village.

rooms.name: Path to Centaur Village
rooms.description:
You are on an east-west path in the forest.  Here the forest is mostly
towering firs, not quite as dense as the oak groves that can be seen eastward.
Westward, the trail heads toward a small clearing.

east.description: A path disappears into thick forest.

west.description: There is a small clearing in this direction.

rooms.name: The East side of the Centaur Clearing
rooms.description:
You are on the east side of a clearing.  Small primitive huts are scattered
about the edges of this clearing.  Beyond these on all sides are towering
fir trees.  A path leads east out of the clearing. The clearing continues to
the west.

east.description: A path leads away through the forest.

west.description: You see the west side of the clearing.

rooms.name: West side of the Centaur Clearing
rooms.description:
You are on the west side of the clearing in the center of the Centaur village.
Huts surround the clearing on all sides, and beyond are towering firs.  The
clearing continues to the east.  To the west is a very large hut.

east.description: You see the east side of the clearing.

rooms.name: A Centaur's Hut
rooms.description:
You are inside a smallish hut, the home of a family of Centaurs.  The hut
is sparsely furnished, mostly the trappings of survival.

south.description: The opening leads out onto the clearing.

rooms.name: A Centaur's Hut
rooms.description:
You are inside a smallish hut, the home of a family of Centaurs.  The hut
is sparsely furnished, mostly the trappings of survival.

north.description: The opening leads out onto the clearing.

rooms.name: A Centaur's Hut
rooms.description:
You are inside a smallish hut, the home of a family of Centaurs.  The hut
is sparsely furnished, mostly the trappings of survival.

south.description: The opening leads out onto the clearing.

rooms.name: A Centaur's Hut
rooms.description:
You are inside a smallish hut, the home of a family of Centaurs.  The hut
is sparsely furnished, mostly the trappings of survival.

north.description: The opening leads out onto the clearing.

rooms.name: Entrance to a Large Hut
rooms.description:
You are in the entry foyer of a large hut.  A curtain separates this section
of the hut from the next section to the west.  To the east is an opening out
onto the clearing.

east.description: The opening leads out onto the clearing.

west.description: There is a curtain here separating this section from the next.

rooms.name: Back of a Large Hut
rooms.description:
You are in the back of a large hut.  A curtain separates this section from
the front of the hut to the east.  This room is finely decorated, if
somewhat primitive.  The decor suggests someone of authority lives here.

east.description: There is a curtain here separating this room from the front of the hut.

rooms.name: Eastern Path in Dark Forest
rooms.description:
You are on an east-west path through extremely old growths of oak.  The path
is fairly faint here.  Undergrowth closes in so closely that little can
be seen in any direction.

west.description: The path continues west through thick forest.

mobiles.name: a killer frog
mobiles.description: A killer frog rises up out of the water.

mobiles.name: the stone gargoyle
mobiles.description: A stone gargoyle looms over you.

mobiles.name: an angry gargoyle
mobiles.description: An angry gargoyle glares at you.

mobiles.name: the elite gargoyle
mobiles.description: An elite gargoyle guards this room against intrusion.

mobiles.name: the gargoyle shaman
mobiles.description: The gargoyle shaman is here, preparing to do battle.

mobiles.name: a carnivorous plant
mobiles.description: Amidst the jungle here, a huge Carnivorous plant reaches out to grab you!

mobiles.name: a gruesome ogre
mobiles.description: A huge, gruesome ogre is sprawled here, gnawing some strange meat.

mobiles.name: a shadow
mobiles.description: A dark shadow moves about the room.

mobiles.name: an evil wight
mobiles.description: An evil wight lurks in the shadows!

mobiles.name: A burly minotaur
mobiles.description: A burly minotaur watches you solemnly.

mobiles.name: the savage minotaur
mobiles.description: A bloodthirsty minotaur slowly counts his loot

mobiles.name: the captain
mobiles.description: Sitting here in this room is the Minotaur Captain.

mobiles.name: the black pudding
mobiles.description: A huge black pudding fills the center of the room!!

mobiles.name: a lesser golem
mobiles.description: A lesser Golem stands guarding the entrance.

mobiles.name: the ancient wyvern
mobiles.description: An enormous, ancient wyvern stares down at your tiny form...

mobiles.name: the spectre
mobiles.description: A spectre has begun to materialize in front of you!

mobiles.name: a trapper
mobiles.description: A trapper stands here, bartering his pelts.

mobiles.name: a hunter
mobiles.description: A hunter rests in here, carrying a fresh kill.

mobiles.name: a ranger
mobiles.description: A grim ranger reclines at a table.

mobiles.name: a ranger leader
mobiles.description: A leader of the Rangers is watching you solemnly.

mobiles.name: the Lord of the Rangers
mobiles.description: The Lord of the Rangers catches your eye.

mobiles.name: a centaur
mobiles.description: A male centaur wanders about this area.

mobiles.name: a centaur
mobiles.description: A female centaur wanders about this area.

mobiles.name: an old centaur
mobiles.description: An old centaur is resting in a corner.

mobiles.name: an elder centaur
mobiles.description: One of the centaur elders is here, watching you.

mobiles.name: a centaur guard
mobiles.description: A strong centaur is standing guard here.

mobiles.name: the centaur chief
mobiles.description: The chief of the centaur villagers reclines here.

mobiles.name: a displacer beast
mobiles.description: A displacer beast is grazing nearby.

objects.name: a rusty cleaver
objects.description: A rusty cleaver lies on a counter top.

objects.name: the fine mace
objects.description: There is a large mace of fine quality here.

objects.name: a long elven dagger
objects.description: A long elven dagger made of adamantite is here.

objects.name: a steel broad sword
objects.description: A fine steel broad sword is lying on the ground.

objects.name: a steel broad sword
objects.description: A very fine steel broad sword is lying on the ground.

objects.name: the rod of might
objects.description: A Rod of Might is lying here.

objects.name: a black kite shield
objects.description: There is a large black kite shield lying here.

objects.name: a commander's helm
objects.description: A commander's helm rests on a table here.

objects.name: a mithril bracer
objects.description: A magical bracer made from mithril lies on the ground!

objects.name: a dark blue cloak
objects.description: A valuable cloak of dark blue cloth lies on the floor.

objects.name: a dark red potion
objects.description: A dark red potion rests on the ground.

objects.name: a bronze chest
objects.description: There is a sturdy bronze chest in the corner.

objects.name: a barrel of ale
objects.description: There is a small barrel in one corner.

objects.name: the twin towers key
objects.description: There is a shiny skeleton key on the ground here.

objects.name: a strange key
objects.description: There is a very strange-looking key on the ground here.

objects.name: a short bow
objects.description: A short bow has been carelessly left here.

objects.name: a long bow
objects.description: A long bow has been foolishly abandoned here.

objects.name: an ancient long sword
objects.description: An ancient long sword has been left here.

objects.name: a fur cap
objects.description: A fur cap lies here on the ground.

objects.name: a pair of travelling boots
objects.description: A sturdy pair of travelling boots lies here.

objects.name: a bronze ring
objects.description: A ring of etched bronze gleams dimly on the ground.
